esprits.name: FILL_ME_IN
esprits.description: WRITE_SOMETHING_CUTE_HERE

esprits.name: Glacivern
esprits.description: Carved from ancient ice and rage, Glacivern freezes time itself before delivering a killing blow.

esprits.name: Blazeblob
esprits.description: A squishy little fire spirit that bounces with excitement and leaves singe marks wherever it goes.

esprits.name: Droozle
esprits.description: A plump little blob of seawater that jiggles when happy and splashes when startled.

esprits.name: Gloomb
esprits.description: A shadowy little blob that giggles quietly in the dark. No one's sure if it's friendly or just hungry.

esprits.name: Muddroot
esprits.description: A slow, sleepy mound of moss and mud that occasionally sprouts tiny leaves when content.

esprits.name: Shynix
esprits.description: Shynix twinkles faintly even in the dark. It's warm to the touch and smells faintly of sugar and stars.

esprits.name: Jelune
esprits.description: Always wobbling, never stoppingâ€”Jelune zips across puddles and gusts of wind like it was born to glide.

esprits.name: Solmane
esprits.description: A noble lion whose mane shimmers with golden light. It protects the weak and punishes darkness with blinding fury.

esprits.name: Gnawgrim
esprits.description: A feral predator cloaked in shadow and bone, it stalks with unnatural silence and strikes without mercy.

esprits.name: Packhorn
esprits.description: This loyal beast carries both gear and hope. Travelers say it always knows the safest path forward.

esprits.name: Brutusk
esprits.description: A towering brute born from molten earth. It charges without hesitation and leaves nothing standing in its path.

esprits.name: Dreadhorn
esprits.description: Its roar makes shadows tremble. Dreadhorn lives for battle and tears through enemies like paper.

esprits.name: Skargan
esprits.description: Covered in bark-like armor and moss, Skargan shrugs off blows and hits back even harder.

esprits.name: Bonegnash
esprits.description: Once a proud dragon, now a skeletal nightmare that feeds on shadow and bone. Its hollow roar echoes with the screams of ancient battlefields.

esprits.name: Thornguard
esprits.description: An ancient warrior whose armor has fused with living bark and thorns. It stands eternal guard over sacred groves, wielding nature's wrath against intruders.

esprits.name: Azurewing
esprits.description: A majestic dragon born from crystallized storm clouds. Its wings shimmer with captured lightning, and its graceful flight can reshape entire weather systems.

esprits.name: Frostcoil
esprits.description: A serpentine dragon that embodies the ocean's deepest mysteries. Ice and water follow in its wake, and its coiled form can freeze entire seas.

esprits.name: Stormbreaker
esprits.description: A fearsome dragon that commands darkness itself. Its roar splits reality, its claws rend light from existence, and its wings summon voids of nothingness.

esprits.name: Thornwarden
esprits.description: An ancient dragon whose very essence is intertwined with the world's forests. Vines and thorns sprout wherever it treads, and its breath can grow entire ecosystems in seconds.

esprits.name: Voidreaper
esprits.description: A nightmarish entity that embodies destruction itself. Its blade can sever souls from reality, and its mere presence unravels the fabric of existence.

esprits.name: Seraphim
esprits.description: A divine entity that embodies pure judgment. Its six wings shine with the light of creation itself, and its presence can purify or incinerate at will.

esprits.name: Lightbringer
esprits.description: A divine warrior who bridges heaven and earth. Clad in celestial armor and wielding a blade of pure light, it brings justice to the mortal realm.

esprits.name: Nightshade
esprits.description: A graceful warrior cloaked in shadow and steel. Her blade moves like liquid darkness, and her presence commands both fear and admiration on any battlefield.

esprits.name: Pyroclasm
esprits.description: The final ember of dying stars given form. Her presence ignites the very concept of heat, and reality burns in her wake like kindling.

esprits.name: Lumina
esprits.description: Divine judgment corrupted into perfect destruction. Her light doesn't illuminateâ€”it erases, burning away the flaws in existence itself.

esprits.name: Nethys
esprits.description: The void between thoughts made manifest. She doesn't destroyâ€”she simply makes things never have existed in the first place.

esprits.name: Thalassa
esprits.description: The deepest ocean's final secret. Her depths contain not water, but the accumulated weight of everything that has ever drowned.

esprits.name: Verdania
esprits.description: Nature's final judgment incarnate. Her thorns don't just pierce fleshâ€”they grow through the cracks in reality, strangling existence itself.

esprits.name: Tempesta
esprits.description: The storm that ends all weather. Her winds don't just move airâ€”they scatter the fundamental forces that hold atoms together.

esprits.name: Oceania
esprits.description: A mystical oracle who communes with the deepest ocean trenches. Her staff channels the whispers of drowned civilizations, and her presence parts reality like water.

esprits.name: Voidwhisper
esprits.description: The shadow between thoughts given elegant form. Her magic doesn't cast darknessâ€”it reveals the void that was always there, waiting beneath reality's thin veneer.

esprits.name: Sylvanna
esprits.description: Nature's darkest secret clothed in emerald silk. Her thorned crown grants dominion over the spaces between growth and decay, where forgotten forests dream.

esprits.name: Pyritha
esprits.description: Flame elevated to divine art. Her fires don't merely burnâ€”they purify concepts themselves, leaving only the essential truth blazing in the void.

esprits.name: Lumensis
esprits.description: Divine light corrupted into something beautiful and terrible. Her radiance doesn't illuminateâ€”it transforms, rewriting the fundamental laws that govern existence.

esprits.name: Stormcaller
esprits.description: Mistress of the eternal storm that rages between dimensions. Her winds carry not air, but the raw essence of change itself, reshaping reality with every breath.

esprits.name: Morticia
esprits.description: Death's most elegant disciple, wielding a staff crowned with the skull of the first nightmare. Her very presence drains color from reality, leaving only beautiful despair.

esprits.name: Hexweaver
esprits.description: A chaotic sorceress who spins storms from pure madness. Her wheel of fate doesn't predict the futureâ€”it shatters it into a thousand beautiful possibilities.

esprits.name: Wrathbringer
esprits.description: Rage given perfect form and crimson wings. Her twin blades burn with the fury of every injustice ever committed, leaving ash where mercy once lived.

esprits.name: Thornmaiden
esprits.description: Nature's wrath disguised as innocent beauty. Her armor grows from living thorns, and her smile promises the kind of growth that strangles civilizations.

esprits.name: Dawnbreaker
esprits.description: A holy warrior who carries the first light of creation in her blade. Her sword doesn't cut fleshâ€”it severs the bonds between sin and soul.

esprits.name: Deepcurrent
esprits.description: Mistress of tides that flow between dimensions. Her staff channels the weight of every ocean that ever was, and her presence drowns hope itself.
